Package com.riskybusiness.neural

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    NeuralNet
         A NeuralNet is a set of Neurons interconnected by Synapses to compute a set of outputs.
    Neuron
        This class represents a single artificial cell in a network of said cells that recieves input, processes those inputs, and generates an output.
    SigmoidNeuron
         A Neuron that uses the sigmoid function as its activation function.
    StepNeuron
         A Neuron that uses a step function as its activation function.
    Synapse
         Describes a connection between two different Neurons.
    Trainer
    An independent Object that may be used to help train a NeuralNet or an individual Neuron.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ExceededNeuronInputException
        A basic Exception that tells us that the amount of inputs sent to a Neuron was greater than the amount it could hold.
    InvalidNeuronInputException
        A type of Exception that states that a given Neuron cannot take the given type of input.
    NeuronCannotFireException
        A basic Exception that tells us that a Neuron could not fire.
